title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Slovakia 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of arrivals in millions, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 5.49 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of arrivals in millions about 3.34 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of arrivals in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Number of arrivals in millions has rose over the Year.
